alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:19PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kenedy, northern Hidalgo, eastern Starr, southeastern Brooks and northwestern Willacy Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Manuel, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, San Manuel, Linn, Norias, Puerto Rico, Red Gate, Edinburg South Texas International Airport Edinburg South Texas International Airport and Rudolph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo
